WorkItem.Description:
The newest version of Rawr 2.3.22 seems to have a problem calculating the hit % for shadow priest seems to be adding 20% from no where to the total hit chance figure. If I switch back to 2.3.21 the hit % is correct.

I have attached a screen shot

Comments.Message: You have a screenshot, and the devs have 4 other duplicate requests, plus a thread dedicated to how this bug was already fixed in the nex version that will be released "soon".

Sorry did a search on hit and it came back with no results about priest hit. If I redo the search now using all issues instead of just open issue's (which is the search default) it finds something. I am not going to spend all day searching through threads to see what else has been reported I came to site checked to see if there was a new version no there wasn't then did a simple search found no matching results, so made a post.
